Description: 
------------------- 
Need for Speed Shift 2 Unleashed - continuation of the popular autosimulator in a series of Need for Speed. At this point, the game implements a more advanced physics system which takes into account the degradation of not only vehicles, but the tracks of road surface, and also added night race. Also out with a helmet, allowing the player to feel like a real pilot. Now the camera is not "attached" to the machine, and can be shaken from all the bumps in the road as if they really are in a race car.
